Text.Page:
The Black Claws attacked two of our work crews yesterday. I'm sending you out to teach them a lesson.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:41#3004#Black Claw crushers} and {@LinkCreature:41#3005#raiders} in the southern parts of Feral Valley.

Report to Keltaria at Emissary Point when you're finished.
You earned this reward, <PCNAME>. Enjoy it.

The Blood Horn tribe is a thorn in the federation's side, and a pain in my backside. It would help a lot if you'd kill the {@LinkCreature:41#3004#Black Claw crushers} and {@LinkCreature:41#3005#raiders} whenever you can. Bring back something to show you've killed them, and I'll part with some federation gold for your trouble.
